snippet: The collective effort to identify the unusual cluster bombs found in several places last year in Libya has yet to reach an answer, or even a consensus on the likely origins of the mystery submunitions.
abstract: The collective effort to identify the unusual cluster bombs found in several places last year in Libya has yet to reach an answer, or even a consensus on the likely origins of the mystery submunitions.
lead_paragraph: The collective effort to identify the unusual cluster bombs found in several places last year in Libya has yet to reach an answer, or even a consensus on the likely origins of the mystery submunitions. Several readers have pitched in publicly here on this site, or on Twitter. Others have sent material and suggestions by e-mail. The comparative illustration, above, fits that second category.
